title: Virtual Assistant – Kajabi and Course Launch Support
job_overview:
We are seeking a reliable and resourceful Virtual Assistant to support the backend setup of Balance Reclaimed, a burnout recovery program for mid-career nurses. The ideal candidate will have strong Kajabi experience and an understanding of BBD (Business By Design by James Wedmore) strategies for online course delivery and automation.

Your tasks will include:  
• Creating a clean and responsive landing page in Kajabi  
• Building the course area framework and uploading content  
• Designing a thank-you page and connecting opt-in forms to email automation  
• Tagging leads and setting up segmented email sequences  
• Creating simple thumbnails for course modules and videos  
• Maintaining structure and flow aligned with BBD-style systems

Applicants must be detail-oriented, proactive, and comfortable with a blend of tech and light design tasks. Knowledge of Canva, Kajabi, and online marketing is preferred.

How to Apply: 
Send a short introduction describing your experience with Kajabi and BBD-style course launches.  
Please include a positive quote that makes you smile somewhere in your message to let us know you read this thoroughly and share our energy.
